name: Pippit AI
tagline: Your smart video & image creator for marketing success
description: Pippit AI is your smart creative agent, designed to streamline and enhance your content production process.

name: Canva Visual Suite 2.0
tagline: Meet Canva AI & Canva Code
description: With Visual Suite 2.0, you can now seamlessly create across every design type, from presentations to videos, whiteboards, and websites, all in one new format. That means no more jumping between tools or losing important context.

name: cognee
tagline: Memory for AI Agents  in 5 lines of code
description: cognee is an open-source semantic memory layer for AI agents, built on vector and graph databases. It constructs knowledge graphs from retrieved data, enabling AI apps and agents to deliver accurate, context-aware responses.

name: Freepik Video Editor
tagline: Fast, easy editing with pro results
description: With the new Freepik online Video Editor, you can edit your AI-generated clips or videos from your gallery. Trim, reorder, or overlay your videos and add music, images, and text. Video editing made easy.

name: ACE
tagline: Multiplayer online UNO based 3D card game
description: Its a multiple UNO like 3D card game, supports 2-8 players and runs right in your browser!

name: HeyGen x HubSpot Integration
tagline: Automate personalized videos at scale
description: Automatically generate personalized videos at scale using HeyGen and HubSpot. Use dynamic fields to tailor content, then embed videos across emails, workflows, and campaigns to boost engagement, conversions, and customer experience.

name: Autoread
tagline: iMessage on auto
description: Automatically responds to iMessages using custom prompts.

name: Yoodio
tagline: Generative radio to create a listen in topics you're into
description: Yoodio is a generative media experience. It's the best place to create and listen to radio broadcasts discussing the topics you're interested in. Simply describe your ideal radio station, the topics you want to hear about, and watch it be made.

name: Llama MacOS Desktop Controller
tagline: Let Llama take over your desktop
description: Shoutout Llamastack x 8VC challenge - WashU This is a React and Flask-based app that processes natural language commands to execute macOS system actions using Python code generated by an LLM.

name: mrkr+
tagline: Mark, export to EDL, and find key moments in your recordings
description: mrkr+ is the iPhone app for filmmakers, documentarians, and content creators who need to silently capture perfect moments. Mark important points with a tap, export to your editing software, and save hours in post-production.

name: PickleWatch
tagline: PickleWatch on Apple Watch: Your ultimate pickleball partner
description: PickleWatch on Apple Watch: Your ultimate pickleball partner. Track serves, rallies, scores & heart rate in real time—no phone needed. Sync to iPhone for heatmaps, stroke charts & personalized tips. Haptic alerts for speed, time & recovery.

name: WenMoon
tagline: Track, compare, and manage your crypto
description: WenMoon combines real-time crypto tracking with macro data, portfolio tools, and market cap comparison — helping you make smarter moves without switching tabs. Built for speed and clarity, with a beautiful UI that makes insights easy to explore.

name: Framer Creator Micro 2
tagline: Creator Micro 2 by Work Louder and Framer
description: Meet the Framer Creator Micro 2 by Framer & Work Louder — a compact keyboard built to speed up your creative workflow.

name: Will - manages your social media
tagline: Create personal LinkedIn posts via WhatsApp in under 5 min
description: Will helps busy professionals with building a LinkedIn presence. Just send a message on WhatsApp, answer a few prompts, and Will turns it into a polished, personalized LinkedIn post—and posts on your behalf. No dashboards. No stress. Just results.

name: Lazy Prompter
tagline: Generate any prompt - text, image, audio & more. Unlimited!
description: Why struggle with prompting & scrolling endless lists? Lazy Prompter instantly generates the right one—tailored for any use case: text, image, audio & more. AI-powered & hassle-free, so you can focus on what matters. Stop searching, start creating.

name: AI Reply Generator - social24
tagline: Convert social media users into customers
description: Generate AI replies for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, and more. Fully customizable prompt: create your own prompt templates with dynamic variables like {{CommenterName}}, {{TopicContent}} to ensure personalized and context-aware replies.

name: AI Note Taker : Audio to Text
tagline: Summarize Lectures & Meetings
description: AI Note Taker transforms your notes through audio transcription, AI summaries, and OCR technology. Perfect for students and professionals, it converts recordings, images, and handwritten text into searchable notes. Share, collaborate, and boost productivity.

name: Widn
tagline: A smarter way to translate and refine your content
description: Widn is powered by Widn’s best-in-class translation LLMs, delivering high-quality translation at ease. With our newest release Widn Lab, it becomes your creative playground — a flexible space to explore, experiment, and shape content until it feels just right.

name: HowToAlgo
tagline: Dominate your next tech interview
description: How to Algo is your all-in-one coding interview dojo—300+ animated explainer videos, real system design mock interviews, and a concise, no-fluff syllabus in 5 languages. Learn smarter, prep faster, and crack MAANG-level interviews with confidence.

name: Voulez Vous
tagline: Your go-to cocktail guide at your fingertips
description: Discover what drink you can make, with what you have at home.
